% Learn about API authentication here: /matlab/getting-started % Find your api_key here: /settings/api % some random points x = normrnd(5,1,100,1); % a simple histogram fig = figure; hist(x) %--PLOTLY--% % Strip MATLAB style by default! response = fig2plotly(fig, 'filename', 'matlab-basic-histogram'); plotly_url = response.url;
